head.title: Custom Outdoor Living & Landscaping | RMR Construction Roseville CA
head.description: RMR Construction & Remodeling transforms outdoor spaces in Placer & Sacramento County with expert landscape construction, concrete work, patios, pergolas, fire pits, artificial turf, whole yard landscaping and more.
head.keywords: outdoor living, landscape construction, concrete patios, stamped concrete, artificial turf, fire pits, pergolas, outdoor kitchens, custom fencing, drainage solutions, irrigation systems, retaining walls, hardscaping, Sacramento, Placer County, concrete construction, concrete, patio covers, patios, walkways, backyard remodeling, artificial turf, irrigation, fencing, retaining walls, driveways, turf, drainage and irrigation, drainage, irrigation, putting greens, pavers, fencing, whole yard landscaping, landscape design, landscape construction, stained concrete, custom concrete, stamped concrete, pool decking, driveway extension, bbq concrete, dry rock beds, stronger than concrete placer concrete construction, edgars concrete, best concrete contractor in Roseville, concrete and masonry contractor, concrete walkways, custom wood structures, outdoor kitchens, landscape design and consulting, artificial turf installation, Roseville masonry, western sates concrete, district concrete construction, best concrete contractors in Roseville, Roseville concrete, concrete contractor, concrete contractors in Roseville, small residential concrete, affordable concrete services, concrete construction in Roseville ca, pf concrete construction, rmr construction and remodeling, Antelope, Arden Arcade, Carmichael, Citrus Heights, Elverta, Foothill Farms, Fair Oaks, McClellan Park, North Highlands, Orangevale, Rio Linda, Rocklin, Roseville, Sacramento

jumbotron.title: Quality Roofing
jumbotron.text: Specializing in durable roofing solutions, RMR Construction & Remodeling serves homeowners and businesses with expert repairs, installations, and maintenance. With decades of experience, we deliver quality craftsmanship tailored to your needs.

message.p: Jose and his team were great. They were very professional and did and excellent job completing my project. Highly recommended!

We are so incredibly impressed with RMR Construction and the work they did on our backyard. Jose is professional, patient and him and his crew do one hell of a great job. We will absolutely be using them for more projects in the future!

Very satisfied for the price. Had my backyard concrete done in October 2024. These guys did a great job with demo and pouring the new concrete. Overall it turned out great and I'm really satisfied. Lastly communication with Jose was great.

RMR did an amazing job on our home. We had lots on dry rot on the siding and trim. They replaced the many rotted spots around the entire house in a timely and professional manner. Then their paint team painted the whole house. It looks amazing. I can't recommend them enough.

We're soooo happy with the outcome of our backyard! I'm so glad that I found RMR. Jose gave us the best deal for what we wanted & provided quality work. Every time I had a question Jose would respond quickly. The RMR team did a wonderful job & we highly recommend them! 10/10!!!!!

Jose Castaneda and his crew did an amazing job with our Front Porch Walkway Steps with lights and dual mow strips. Definitely enhanced the overall curb appeal of our home - Great Job! Kevin and Bela Daly.

I reached out to RMR because I saw their contact information on one of my neighbors lawns that they had worked on. I wanted to extend my backyard concrete patio area, extend my front driveway and add a RV parking concrete driveway. I got quotes from many companies. However, I chose RMR because they had the best price while at the same time still offering the same quality build materials and build standards as all the other more expensive companies. RMR was very responsive throughout the construction process, I would receive responses to my questions in a timely fashion. RMR provided me with a timeline to the construction process which they stuck too and completed the project on time as promised. It was a great experience working with RMR.

We just can't say enough about how pleased and impressed we are with our backyard concrete and turf. In RMR Construction and Remodeling is a shining example of excellence. Every team member was friendly, polite and accommodating. Especially the owner Jose he is an amazingly hard worker, kind and very helpful, selfless person. Their attention to every detail shows in the beautiful results. We have already had several people stop to ask what company did the work. Rest assured that we will be telling everyone about RMR Construction and Remodeling.
